description:
Subscale score based on 3 items from the Obstructive Sleep Apnea-18 Quality of Life Questionnaire. Range 3 to 21. A higher score indicates greater emotional distress. [Franco RA et al., 2000 (PubMed ID: 10889473)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/10889473/)

[Search for all OSA-18 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=osa18)
